item.name: Authentication
item.description:
API endpoints for user registration, login, and logout functionalities.
These endpoints allow users to register an account, login with their credentials, and logout by deleting their authentication tokens.

request.description:
This endpoint allows a user to register with the provided details. Upon successful registration, a token is generated and returned to the user.
The registration data must include a unique email address, a valid password (min length 8 characters), and a user type.

response.body:
{
   "status": "success",
   "data": {
       "id": 1,
       "nickname": "JohnDoe",
       "given_name": "John",
       "family_name": "Doe",
       "email": "john.doe@example.com",
       "company_id": 1,
       "user_type": "client",
       "status": "active",
       "token": "generated_token_here"
   },
   "message": "You are registered successfully with token generated_token_here"
}
response.name: Successful registration
Validation Error

request.description: This endpoint allows the user to logout by deleting their authentication tokens, effectively invalidating any active sessions.

item.name: Companies
item.description: APIs to manage companies including creating, updating, retrieving, and deleting companies.

request.description: This endpoint retrieves all the companies from the database.

formdata.description: The ID of the city where the company is located.
The ID of the state where the company is located.
The ID of the country where the company is located.

request.description: This endpoint allows authorized users to create a new company in the database.

item.name: Get a single company by ID.

variable.description: The ID of the company to retrieve.

request.description: This endpoint retrieves the details of a specific company using its ID.

variable.description: The ID of the company to update.

formdata.description: The updated name of the company.

request.description: This endpoint allows an authorized user to update the details of an existing company.

variable.description: The ID of the company to delete.

request.description: This endpoint allows an authorized user to delete a company by its ID.

item.name: Restore a deleted company by ID.

variable.description: The ID of the company to restore.

request.description: This endpoint allows an authorized user to restore a company that was soft-deleted.
This endpoint allows an authorized user to restore all soft-deleted companies.

item.name: Position Management
item.description:
This controller handles all operations related to managing positions. It includes functionalities
for retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting positions. The operations are gated based on user
authorization and the user's authentication status.

item.name: Display a listing of the positions.

query.description: The page number for pagination (defaults to 1).

request.description:
This endpoint retrieves a list of positions based on user authentication status:
- Authenticated users: Receives paginated results of positions.
- Unauthenticated users: Receives a limited number of positions.

response.body:
{
   "success": true,
   "message": "Positions retrieved successfully",
   "data": [
       {
           "id": 1,
           "advertising_start_date": "2024-01-01",
           "advertising_end_date": "2024-01-31",
           "title": "Position Title",
           "description": "Position Description",
           "keywords": "keyword1, keyword2",
           "min_salary": 50000,
           "max_salary": 70000,
           "salary_currency": "AUD",
           "company_id": 1,
           "user_id": 1,
           "benefits": "Benefit details",
           "requirements": "Requirement details",
           "position_type": "permanent"
       }
   ]
}
response.name: Successful response
Unauthorized

item.name: Store a newly created position in storage.

body.raw: {"advertising_start_date":"quia","advertising_end_date":"iste","title":"modi","description":"Fugit distinctio laborum quo et delectus dolor libero.","keywords":"magnam","min_salary":"amet","max_salary":"dolores","salary_currency":"soluta","company_id":18,"user_id":12,"benefits":"eius","requirements":"eveniet","position_type":"nostrum"}

request.description:
This endpoint allows authorized users to create a new position. All fields marked as required must
be provided, and the user must be authorized to create positions.

response.body:
{
   "success": true,
   "message": "Position created successfully",

       "company_id": 1,
       "user_id": 1,
       "benefits": "Benefit details",
       "requirements": "Requirement details",
       "position_type": "permanent"
   }
}
response.name: Position created successfully

variable.description: The ID of the position to retrieve.

request.description: This endpoint retrieves a specific position by its ID. Users must be authenticated to access this endpoint.

item.name: Remove the specified position from storage.

variable.description: The ID of the position to delete.

request.description: This endpoint allows an authorized user to delete a specific position.

item.name: User Management
item.description: APIs for managing users in the system, including CRUD operations and restoring deleted users.

item.name: Display a listing of the users.

request.description: This endpoint retrieves all users in the system. Only authorized users (based on user roles) can access this resource.

item.name: Store a newly created user in storage.

request.description: This endpoint validates the provided data and creates a new user in the system.
Show the details of a specific user by ID.

item.name: Update the specified user in storage.

request.description: Validates and updates the user’s details.

item.name: Remove the specified user from storage (soft delete).

request.description: Marks the user as deleted (soft delete) and prevents them from accessing the system.

variable.description: The ID of the user to restore.

request.description: Restores a user that was previously soft-deleted.
